derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French académicien, from medieval Latin academicus (see academic)

encyclopedia.content: academician n. 院士 学会会员 national academician 国家科学院院士 院士（Academician）源于Academy。 Academy是古希腊传说中的一位拯救雅典免遭劫难而牺牲的英雄。希腊人为了纪念这位智慧勇敢的英雄，建立了一个以Academy命名的幽静园林。在建园后的916年的时间内，受到Academy智慧勇敢感动的学者，纷纷在园内讲学，进行自发的学术活动。因此，其后的许多学术团体都自称为 “Academy”。1666年，法国成立了皇家科学院，到科学院

entry.def: An academician is a member of an academy, usually one which has been formed to improve or maintain standards in a particular field.

means.word_mean: 1. someone elected to honorary membership in an academy
2. a scholar who is skilled in academic disputation
3. an educator who works at a college or university
